languages.text: "Тервантьяса... обокрали? Я много отдал бы за то, чтобы видеть его лицо в тот момент, когда он узрел свое логово!" {n}Маражай глумливо смеется, затем окидывает взглядом помещение.{/n} "Впрочем, это место... Это не логово гемункула. Слишком безопасное. Слишком убогое. Скорее — последнее пристанище".

traits.locale_text: "Тервантьяса... обокрали? Я много отдал бы за то, чтобы видеть его лицо в тот момент, когда он узрел свое логово!" {n}Маражай глумливо смеется, затем окидывает взглядом помещение.{/n} "Впрочем, это место... Это не логово гемункула. Слишком безопасное. Слишком убогое. Скорее — последнее пристанище".
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "Tervantias was... robbed? I really wish I could have seen his face the moment he looked upon his lair!" {n}Marazhai laughs mockingly, then looks around the room.{/n} "Although this place... is not a Haemonculus's lair. Too safe. Too shabby. More of a last refuge."
languages.original_text: "Тервантьяса... обокрали? Я много отдал бы за то, чтобы видеть его лицо в тот момент, когда он узрел свое логово!" {n}Маражай глумливо смеется, затем окидывает взглядом помещение.{/n} "Впрочем, это место... Это не логово гемункула. Слишком безопасное. Слишком убогое. Скорее — последнее пристанище".

traits.locale_text: "Tervantias was... robbed? I really wish I could have seen his face the moment he looked upon his lair!" {n}Marazhai laughs mockingly, then looks around the room.{/n} "Although this place... is not a Haemonculus's lair. Too safe. Too shabby. More of a last refuge."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: “特万提亚斯……居然被人抢走了东西？他的巢穴居然变成了这个样子，要是能亲眼看到他当时的表情就好了！”{n}玛拉斋嘲弄地大笑起来，随后环视着房间。{/n}“不过这个地方……并不是血伶人的巢穴。这里过于安全，也过于寒酸，更像是他最后的避难所。”
languages.original_text: "Tervantias was... robbed? I really wish I could have seen his face the moment he looked upon his lair!" {n}Marazhai laughs mockingly, then looks around the room.{/n} "Although this place... is not a Haemonculus's lair. Too safe. Too shabby. More of a last refuge."

traits.locale_text: “特万提亚斯……居然被人抢走了东西？他的巢穴变成了这个样子，要是能亲眼看到他当时的表情就好了！”{n}玛拉斋嘲弄地大笑起来，随后环视着房间。{/n}“不过这个地方……并不是血伶人的巢穴。这里太安全了，也太寒酸了，更像是他最后的避难所。”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "Tervantias wurde ... ausgeraubt? Ich hätte zu gerne sein Gesicht gesehen, als er sein Versteck so entdeckt hat!" {n}Marazhai lacht spöttisch und sieht sich dann um.{/n} "Auch wenn das hier ... kein Haemonculus-Versteck ist. Zu sicher. Zu schäbig. Eher eine letzte Zuflucht."
languages.original_text: "Tervantias was... robbed? I really wish I could have seen his face the moment he looked upon his lair!" {n}Marazhai laughs mockingly, then looks around the room.{/n} "Although this place... is not a Haemonculus's lair. Too safe. Too shabby. More of a last refuge."

traits.locale_text: "Tervantias wurde ... ausgeraubt? Ich hätte zu gerne sein Gesicht gesehen, als er sein Versteck so entdeckt hat!" {n}Marazhai lacht spöttisch und sieht sich dann um.{/n} "Auch wenn das hier ... kein Haemonculus-Versteck ist. Zu sicher. Zu schäbig. Eher eine letzte Zuflucht."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: «¿Quizá... le han entrado a robar? ¡Ojalá hubiera podido ver la cara que puso Tervantias cuando se encontró su guarida de esta guisa!». {n}Marazhai suelta una carcajada burlona, luego echa un vistazo alrededor de la sala.{/n} «Aunque este sitio... no parece la guarida de un hemónculo. Demasiado seguro. Demasiado descuidado. Tiene más pinta de refugio».
languages.original_text: "Tervantias was... robbed? I really wish I could have seen his face the moment he looked upon his lair!" {n}Marazhai laughs mockingly, then looks around the room.{/n} "Although this place... is not a Haemonculus's lair. Too safe. Too shabby. More of a last refuge."

traits.locale_text: «¿Quizá... le han entrado a robar? ¡Ojalá hubiera podido ver la cara que puso Tervantias cuando se encontró su guarida de esta guisa!». {n}Marazhai suelta una carcajada burlona, luego echa un vistazo alrededor de la sala.{/n} «Aunque este sitio... no parece la guarida de un hemónculo. Demasiado seguro. Demasiado descuidado. Tiene más pinta de refugio».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: « On a... cambriolé Tervantias ? Si vous saviez comme je regrette de ne pas avoir été là pour voir sa tête quand il a découvert son repaire dans cet état ! » {n}Marazhai éclate d'un rire moqueur puis observe la pièce.{/n} « Cela dit, cet endroit... n'est pas le repaire d'un hémoncule. C'est trop sûr, trop miteux. Ça ressemble davantage à un ultime refuge. »
languages.original_text: "Tervantias was... robbed? I really wish I could have seen his face the moment he looked upon his lair!" {n}Marazhai laughs mockingly, then looks around the room.{/n} "Although this place... is not a Haemonculus's lair. Too safe. Too shabby. More of a last refuge."

traits.locale_text: « On a... cambriolé Tervantias ? Si vous saviez comme je regrette de ne pas avoir été là pour voir sa tête quand il a découvert son repaire dans cet état ! » {n}Marazhai éclate d'un rire moqueur puis observe la pièce.{/n} « Cela dit, cet endroit... n'est pas le repaire d'un hémoncule. C'est trop sûr, trop miteux. Ça ressemble davantage à un ultime refuge. »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: 「テルヴァンティアスが…強盗に？奴が自分の隠れ家を見た瞬間の顔が見たかったぜ！」{n}マラズハイはあざ笑うと、部屋を見回す。{/n}「とはいえここは…ハモンキュラスの隠れ家じゃない。安全すぎる。みすぼらしすぎる。それよりは、最後の避難場所ってところだ」
languages.original_text: "Tervantias was... robbed? I really wish I could have seen his face the moment he looked upon his lair!" {n}Marazhai laughs mockingly, then looks around the room.{/n} "Although this place... is not a Haemonculus's lair. Too safe. Too shabby. More of a last refuge."

traits.locale_text: 「テルヴァンティアスが…強盗に？奴が自分の隠れ家を見た瞬間の顔が見たかったぜ！」{n}マラズハイはあざ笑うと、部屋を見回す。{/n}「とはいえここは…ハモンキュラスの隠れ家じゃない。安全すぎる。みすぼらしすぎる。それよりは、最後の避難場所ってところだ」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "Tervantias'ı... Soymuşlar mı? Mekânın şu hâlini gördüğü zamanki yüz ifadesine tanık olabilseydim keşke!" {n}Marazhai, alaycı bir tavırla gülüyor. Sonra odaya göz gezdiriyor.{/n} "Gerçi burası... Haimonkulus ini falan değil. Fazla güvenli. Fazla salaş. Son çare olarak gelmiş sanki."
languages.original_text: "Tervantias was... robbed? I really wish I could have seen his face the moment he looked upon his lair!" {n}Marazhai laughs mockingly, then looks around the room.{/n} "Although this place... is not a Haemonculus's lair. Too safe. Too shabby. More of a last refuge."

traits.locale_text: "Tervantias'ı... Soymuşlar mı? Mekânın şu hâlini gördüğü zamanki yüz ifadesine tanık olabilseydim keşke!" {n}Marazhai, alaycı bir tavırla gülüyor. Sonra odaya göz gezdiriyor.{/n} "Gerçi burası... Haimonkulus ini falan değil. Fazla güvenli. Fazla salaş. Son çare olarak gelmiş sanki."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion
